title: AMD is working on 55W Zen 4 processors for high-end gaming laptops
content:
AMD has shared a closer look at its upcoming product roadmap for the PC market, specifically its Ryzen 7000 processors based on the Zen 4 architecture. In this roadmap image, the company has revealed its plans for the next generation of gaming laptop processors, which include the Phoenix series and the new Dragon Range series.

The post AMD is working on 55W Zen 4 processors for high-end gaming laptops appeared first on XDA.
description: AMD has revealed that it's working on 55W processors based on its Zen 4 architecture. These will be coming to gaming laptops in 2023.
